page.title: 01TOFTWOOD AND WESTFIELD AREA
page.content: This block lies immediately south of the town of East Dereham which has a population of 13,000. Toftwood is a suburb of this town and it consists almost entirely of private housing, built from the 1960s onwards. Over 5,000 people live in Toftwood. On the edge of Toftwood is a light industrial estate built by Breckland District Council. The village of Westfield is 3 miles south of East Dereham and has a population of just under 200. It is a desirable residential area but possesses few amenities. The majority of land in this block consists of rich arable farmland and scattered farmhouses. Our survey includes information about these three different land uses.
